name: X001 Infiltrator
description:
Chrome recommended. Firefox is much slower. Does not work in Edge at all.

Play as a robot to eradicate other robots. Made for the 7DRL challenge.

Your robot has 360 degree LIDAR which is your main viewport up top. Time moves only when you move or act. Hold down left mouse button in the viewport to move towards the direction you're pointing at with the mouse. Hold down right mouse button to wait in place.

S and F keys select Shoot mode

D and M keys select Move mode
